headline: Did Vistra’s 20-Year Nuclear Deal With Meta Just Shift Vistra’s (VST) Investment Narrative?
summary: Vistra recently announced a 20-year agreement to supply over 2,600 MW of nuclear power to Meta Platforms, supporting the heavy electricity needs of AI-driven data centers across major U.S. markets. This long-duration, zero-carbon contract underscores how Vistra’s nuclear fleet and clean-energy acquisitions are turning it into a key infrastructure partner for big technology companies. Next, we’ll examine how Vistra’s long-term nuclear contract with Meta shapes its investment narrative amid...
